title: What are some novel recommendations of demons that are made of chaos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you ever heard of a web novel that is called Son of Chaos? If you haven’t you can try and read this book out. You will be told about a story of a person called Ivan that will go on a journey in order to find out his past and search for his future. This web novel is really good because of the story line, character development, good main character with an overpowered power that is not too overrated, and many more. If you have the time, do check out this novel and I hope this helps.

I can’t tell you which book in the series has the most about such beings, but Fred Saberhagen’s The Empire of the East series has demons made of chaos. (Empire of the East series - Wikipedia) Specifically, the chaos and raw emotion created when most humans died suddenly and violently in a great war…
